articles.title: Asia Cup 2023 Team India Squad Announcement: Shreyas Iyer-KL Rahul back, Tilak Varma receives maiden ODI call up - The Indian Express
articles.description: Asia Cup 2023 Team India Squad Announcement: Sanju Samson has been added as the reserve.
articles.content: -KL Rahul and Shreyas Iyer return: The addition of Sanju Samson as a back up is owing to KL Rahul having picked a niggle, as confirmed by chief selector Ajit Agarkar. Shreyas Iyer on the other hand, … [+1563 chars]
